meanings.definition: To make global or worldwide in scope or application.
meanings.sent1: The company globalizes its products by selling them in many countries.
meanings.sent2: Technology globalizes communication, allowing people from different countries to connect instantly.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous explorer globalizes his collection of rare artifacts by traveling to every continent.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter globalizes joy, spreading happiness wherever she goes.
meanings.sent5: The internet globalizes information, making knowledge accessible to everyone around the world.

meanings.definition: To extend to all parts of the world.
meanings.sent1: The pandemic globalizes quickly, affecting people in every corner of the world.
meanings.sent2: Trade globalizes as companies expand their reach to international markets.
meanings.sent3: The rumor about the new movie globalizes rapidly, reaching movie fans worldwide.
meanings.sent4: Music globalizes emotions, connecting people from diverse cultures through shared melodies.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh flowers globalizes, filling the air with a sweet fragrance across the globe.
